name: Mat Wars
description:
Mat Wars

A game inspired by the classic "Asteroids"

Developed for Mini Jam 116

Theme: Pocket Sized

Limitation: All Movement is Tile Based

Gameplay :

Movement -> WASD
Shoot-> MOUSE LEFT

Credits:

Music/ SFX :  Heinar

Game Designer:  Kashink / Heinar / Kvdon

Unity Programer: Kashink

Art/ UI Designer :  Heinar / Marluce

A Team from Brazil!
